title: Leather Cloth
description:
3/8\" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Brown warp. 3 color leather and/or vinyl weft (white, tan & lt. tan) + olive green weft.
2.75\" thin strip of additional leather inserted into left edge of face weft. Stapled to black 8.5 x 11\" card with 99.1.1012.16. (brown, tan & white)
